attributes.action: condemn the BBC and Sky for refusing to broadcast the DEC appeal for Gaza.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should, at the very least, speak up and condemn these two major broadcasters for refusing to air the Disasters Emergency Committee appeal to help the people of Gaza. Due to the BBC's independence from the Government, he is not able to order the BBC to show the appeal, but he can and should express his personal opinion on their refusal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
